comments.upictitle: The Knight in Shining Skull T-shirt: pic#106375917
comments.article:
Fat Robert!

Hey hey hey!
LOL! XD That was my first thought when I saw "Fat Robert". XD
I love Ser Jorah so Im hoping for him! w00t!
I'm surprised Ser Jorah isn't getting more votes. He's such a great, tragic character.
It's REALLY hard to just select a few, because I want to see them all. =(
Hodor. Hodor hodor hodor. Hodor, hodor hodor hodor hodor hodor; hodor hodor hodor, hodor. Hodor hodor hodor? Hodor, hodor hodor...

Hodor. Hodor hodor hodor. Hodor, hodor hodor hodor hodor hodor; hodor hodor hodor, hodor. Hodor hodor hodor? Hodor, hodor hodor...*

*translation: I second this.
queeeeen dany you say? is that an awesome spoiler? targaryen for the seven kingdoms 2012 wooo!
Dany is a queen by birthright, so it's not exactly a spoiler.  Her people consider her to be a queen anyway.
Hmm, Dany. And possibly fat Robert. Would love to see young slim Robert but then the timeline is goofy.
Go Stormborn!  Surprised to see my favorite character given so much love!
Love to see Dany with her dragons... That would be magnificent. Bran is a close second.  Wonderful! Thanks, GRR.

Ah... we've already done Dany with the dragons hatchlings, as they emerged from the funeral pyre. Beautiful Tom Meier sculpt, and available in both 54mm and 32mm sizes.

This Dany would be sans dragons. Dany as queen, with hair, and some clothes on.
comments.subject: Dany

comments.article: Hodor! Hodor, hodor.

comments.upictitle: "Desolation" Williams: so I know what you're thinking Waco Kid!
comments.article: Fat Robert all the way! I need a miniature that looks like me! ;)
Shame you can't work Ser  Pytan Mning into the story line.
comments.subject: Lets talk about some football.

comments.article: I'm all for that!!
comments.subject: Re: Lets talk about some football.

comments.upictitle: They Call Me Roxy: Actres- Keira bored
comments.article: Daenerys all the way.

It's not on the list, but I'd like to see The Mountain That Rides. :>

Egan
The Mountain has been done.  Go to the Dark Sword website, and you can order one today.
need more voting for Bran and Hodor!
seconded
Ходор, ходор,ходор... It's mean 'hodor' in russian))
Benjen Stark, First Ranger of course=))
Bran and Hodor )) Hodor-Hodor...
The Beggar King please! He needs some love :p

Ah, Dany, I want to see her ♥

I also voted for the two Roberts, just because I thought he'd need more love than Benjen XD

It was great to see the miniatures and how wonderfully painted they were afterwards. Thank you for sharing this with us. With a little luck, I'll see them arrive in France, one of those days. :)

I am pleasantly surprised to see Benjen doing so well. Nice.

Looking at the results, Dany's the runaway favorite. I'd like to see her sculpted in Dothraki-style clothing (the vest and leggings), since we haven't seen anyone turn their hand to that yet. She's already mostly nude in the first figure, so the Qartheen gown she has later on seems a bit too similar. Or does she adopt the tokar in Meereen? That could work, if she does, though I suspect she would not.

Some day, Dany riding the silver at her wedding -- maybe about to leap the flames? -- would be an excellent addition to the series of Dany figures.
So far, it looks like Daenerys in a walk :)
Well, she is important, and must be respected (she also has some dragons about her, so its better not to make her angry!)
comments.subject: The queen!

comments.article: I couldn't agree more, hippoiathanatoi. Drothraki-style clothing, preferably on her horse. :)
An "other" miniature figure would be nice, because I had always problems to imagine them. ^^
Glad to see both Fat and Thin Roberts doing well!  I think it is nothing but sheer prurience that puts Daenerys Targaryen in the lead!
